Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label different plants and animals, including a fish.
The student can draw and label the habitat where the fish lives (e.g., a lake, river, or ocean).
The student can label the resources that the fish needs to survive, like water and food.
The student can show the relationships in the drawing, such as how the fish uses the water to swim and live.
The student can connect the fish and its needs to the environment, showing how they all work together as a system.
